original_title: The Adventures Of Chuck And Friends: Friends To The Finish
overview: Sit back with your whole family and join Tonka Chuck, the little dump truck with big dreams, and his amazing friends Rally, Porter, Handy, Digger, Biggs, Soku, Haulie, Rowdy and Boomer, for loads of fun as they race their way to a great time!
title: The Adventures Of Chuck And Friends: Friends To The Finish
